en.title: Research Interests
en.description: My research focuses on computational linguistics, phonetics, and neurolinguistics, with particular emphasis on cross-linguistic acoustic patterns and AI applications in language processing.

zh.title: 研究 興趣
zh.description: 我的研究專注於計算語言學、語音學與神經語言學，特別著重於跨語言聲學模式與人工智慧在語言處理中的應用。

en.title: Arabic Geminate Consonants: Acoustic Analysis and Production Challenges
en.description: Investigating the acoustic properties of Arabic geminate consonants and the production difficulties faced by Mandarin speakers. This research combines experimental phonetics with computational analysis to understand cross-linguistic transfer patterns.

zh.title: 阿拉伯語重音輔音：聲學分析與發音挑戰
zh.description: 研究阿拉伯語重音輔音的聲學特性以及華語母語者面臨的發音困難。此研究結合實驗語音學與計算分析，理解跨語言遷移模式。

en.title: AI-Enhanced Linguistic Analysis Tools
en.description: Developing machine learning models to assist in phonetic transcription and linguistic pattern recognition. Focus on creating tools that reflect cognitive logic in language structure analysis.

zh.title: AI 增強語言學分析工具
zh.description: 開發機器學習模型以協助語音轉錄和語言模式識別。專注於創造反映語言結構分析中認知邏輯的工具。

en.title: Computational Linguistics
en.description: Natural language processing, machine learning applications in linguistics, automated phonetic analysis, and language technology development.

zh.title: 計算語言學
zh.description: 自然語言處理、機器學習在語言學中的應用、自動化語音分析，以及語言技術開發。

en.title: Phonetics & Phonology
en.description: Acoustic phonetics, cross-linguistic sound patterns, gemination phenomena, and articulatory challenges in second language acquisition.

zh.title: 語音學與音韻學
zh.description: 聲學語音學、跨語言音韻模式、重音現象，以及第二語言習得中的發音挑戰。

en.title: Neurolinguistics
en.description: Brain mechanisms of language processing, cognitive approaches to linguistic analysis, and neural correlates of multilingual competence.

zh.title: 神經語言學
zh.description: 語言處理的大腦機制、語言學分析的認知方法，以及多語能力的神經關聯。

en.title: Multilingualism & Language Contact
en.description: Cross-linguistic influence, code-switching phenomena, and the cognitive implications of multilingual language processing.

zh.title: 多語現象與語言接觸
zh.description: 跨語言影響、語碼轉換現象，以及多語言處理的認知意涵。
